ContractItemPriceAdjTier.name: ContractItemPriceAdjTier
ContractItemPriceAdjTier.description: Represents the tiers of a price adjustment to a product on a contract.

ContractItemPriceId.description: The contract item price ID associated with the contract item price adjustment tier.

LowerBound.description: The minimum quantity for the adjustment to be applicable.

UpperBound.description: The maximum quantity for the adjustment to be applicable.

ContractItemPriceAdjTier.accessRules: This object is available with Revenue Cloud.
